snippet: Chicago’s ban on gun shops violates the Constitution, a federal judge ruled on Monday, dealing the latest setback to politicians who had put in place some of the nation’s strictest limits on firearms.
abstract: Federal Judge Edmond E Chang rules that Chicago’s ban on gun shops violates Constitution; ruling deals latest setback to politicians who had put in place some of nation’s strictest limits on firearms.
lead_paragraph: Chicago’s ban on gun shops violates the Constitution, a federal judge ruled on Monday, dealing the latest setback to politicians who had put in place some of the nation’s strictest limits on firearms.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Chicago’s Ban on Gun Shops
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Chicago’s Ban on Gun Shops
